name: Under The Couch
description:
Put on the shoes of a TV remote who has fallen under the couch, explore the unknown as you will travel through whatever hides down there. Fight for your cleanness and try to escape. You might find yourself lost!

This game was made for the Global Game Jam, you can check the entire team here:

https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/under-couch-2
